thread.title: Rand Logistics Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Protection

author: Patrick Fitzgerald
title: Rand Logistics Files for Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Protection
text:
Rand Logistics Inc., one of the largest bulk-freight shipping companies in the Great Lakes region, is seeking bankruptcy protection after agreeing to a debt-for-equity swap with Lightship Capital LLC.
Rand, whose corporate headquarters are in Jersey City, N.J., said Monday the deal with junior lender Lightship will eliminate $92 million in debt from it books.
